content: the cabin dishcloth is easy and quick to make use your favorite cotton yarn to make them in any color you like make several and give them as gifts people love a good cotton dishcloth for gift giving tie a piece of jute around several of them and tie a bow on top i added a little card to mine too to make these you just need to know how to make a slip_stitch single_crochet and half_double_crochet easy peasy
